name: They Wronged Us
description:
You are Detective Barlow. A shocking murder has rocked the spacefaring community, Captain Bean has been found murdered in his own quarters, and it was one of his own crew that murdered him. Your job is to find out who did it, and make sure that this community of spacefarers can breathe easy once more.

Created By:

Jamie Sorrell

Jodie Donovan

Luke Nockles

Thomas Warburton
